wikipedia_page.main: John Faucit Savill or Saville, also known as John Savill(e) Faucit, stage name Mr Faucit, (1783?–1853) was an English actor, playwright and theatre manager. He married Harriet Diddear, later known as Harriet Elizabeth Savill  and as Mrs Faucit. They had six children including the actress Helena Faucit (also known as Helen).
